category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Eliminate Toxins

action.primary: Clears Heat, drains Dampness, stops diarrhea and reduces inflammation
Cools the Blood and eliminates toxins and stops bleeding

indications: Toxic Heat in the Blood that causes bleeding and cancer

contraindications: Do not use long term on elderly patients.

notes: This herb treats gonorrhea, hepatitis, intestinal parasites and urodynia.

This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
To stop bleeding and generate new flesh, the juice from this herb is mixed with wine and may be ingested or applied topically.
The powder treats pain due to Qi Stagnation.
